GHOST SDK Reference Manual

II - GHOST GL library

gfxDisplaySettingsPer node display lists and settings.
gfxPhantomDisplaySettingsDisplay lists and settings for the gstPHANToM node.
ghostGLActionObjectBase class for action objects such as the pinch transform.
ghostGLCameraBaseA flexible OpenGL interface for a basic camera viewing transform.
ghostGLDrawProvides OpenGL based routines for drawing GHOST nodes.
ghostGLManagerThe GhostGL Manager class makes up the core of the GhostGL library.
ghostGLPinchXFormAllow the PHANToM position/orientation to change the camera view.
ghostGLSyncCameraAutomatically determines an optimal viewing transform and/or haptic orientation transform.
ghostGLUTManagerAdds windowing with GLUT to ghostGLManager.
